website_summaries.verdict: A gentle anti-wrinkle serum that won't irritate sensitive skin.
pros: A good choice for sensitive skin
Softens and tightens skin for a decreased appearance of lines and wrinkles
cons: Some find the scent to be too overbearing

customer_reviews.title: Changed formulation
customer_reviews.text: I used to swear by this product. Then, a while ago, I reordered through Amazon. Smelled like chemicals and remained sticky, so, thinking I got a fake, I returned it. I repurchased through another seller as well as directly from manufacturer... same issues. They did admit they had changed their formulation. I find that this happens often. A good product comes out, and then once the manufacturer has established credibility, they change it to a lesser quality, knowing that people will keep buying unwittingly because of placebo effect. Doesn't work with me, though.
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: NEW Effective Serum
customer_reviews.text: I have been an Derma-E fan for many years. I loved their peptide cream for Age-defying...it was nice, but..... Then this Advanced Peptides PLUS Collagen serum--had to try it! I am delighted to say that actually DOES reduce fine lines, uneven skin tone & the collagen is a great plumper -- without the grease! I am totally sold on this new concoction!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Wopp

customer_reviews.title: Excellent natural product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for approximately two months. There’s no question there’s a difference in my skin. I’m 67 years old and greatly appreciate knowing I am giving myself the best care available.
customer_reviews.author: Gwynne Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Item Not as Described
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through several bottles of this product, and the one I recently received contains a serum that is of foreign consistency - similar to a clear jelly. Amazon says the item cannot be returned, but I'm hoping the Seller (who I've purchased from before) will consider an exchange so I can actually get what I paid for. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Olivia P.

customer_reviews.title: Changed my life!
customer_reviews.text: I have pretty sensitive skin- more dry than oily. I break out easy and have been showing baby wrinkles on my forehead as well as sun damage. I've tried a lot of serums and though they help the texture of my skin, nothing really made a difference like this product. My lines have faded, my melasma too! It goes on so nice under my makeup and Ive had glowing skin since. I've received a tester of this product through ipsy and I'm so happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie M

customer_reviews.title: does it's job
customer_reviews.text: My favorite peptide serum. I believe this is my 2nd or 3rd bottle and I will continue to repurchase. It does what it says and my skin loves it. I notice a huge difference in the plump-Ness to my skin. I use it as preventative anti aging but the few fine lines I have it makes them hydrated and invisible.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: This is a good serum, light and non sticky, works well with makeup. I think it will work better for me in the summer months when my skin doesn't need as much moisturizing. I also ordered the cream and it seems to be working better for me at the moment than the serum but both are great products and would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Goes on easily, has a moisturizing benefit
customer_reviews.text: I think my skin looks brighter and more smooth since I have been using this for only a week. Goes on easily, has a moisturizing benefit. I will continue to purchase this product and I’m interested in checking out there other products. Heard about this product from a YouTube channel on skincare.
customer_reviews.author: Marguerite Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: OMG! I purchased this product on the recommendation of a friend and I wasn't disappointed. It's incredible. I'm 69 y/o and have a few fine lines around my eyes. I have tried multiple eye creams and saw minor results until I started incorporating this serum into my facial regimen. I use it in am/pm and apply all over including neck prior to moisturizer. I can honestly say that I saw improvement after the first use. The collagen will add fullness to diminish the fine lines and address other skin issues. Your skin will look and feel so much better. I am very pleased with my purchase and with the results!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Gillmore

customer_reviews.title: Peptides and Collagen
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a product with these ingredients and this is my 2nd purchase; as to if it is doing what the ingredients are stated to accomplish would probably require a scientific review but I can say there is no question it has helped strengthen my skin so when I bump into an edge I don't get one of those thin skin red marks that take weeks to absorb.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Strong lavender fragrance
customer_reviews.text: I used to love this brand, but I really dislike this product. The fragrance is like lavender, which I like the smell of lavender but it’s way too strong for my face. I would prefer no fragrance, but I can tolerate mild fragrance – but this is too much. Plus I don’t really see any results. In fact my skin has been more red and blotchy since I started using it probably cause it’s irritated from the fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Lov it.
customer_reviews.text: I love the product. My only problem is it was not sealed when i got both time. So, m mot sure if it was opned before. Please, put some kind of seal on your packing.
customer_reviews.author: Bitaran jang maden

customer_reviews.title: Excellent poduct!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I've been using it for over a year and it's really help with forehead lines. The smell is nice and leaves my face feeling silky.
customer_reviews.author: Marnee l.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Derma-E product
customer_reviews.text: Can't argue with the ingredients. My only complaint is that this doesn't have a serum consistency, it's more of a lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: Best Serum Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I received a sample size of this in a monthly makeup subscription program, I fell in love with it the first week. It does not make your skin shiny or greasy. I have oily skin so serums usually add to my shine and I hate that. But this one does not do that. It dries quickly and is an exceptional product for the price. I noticed the complete disappearance of my fine lines (the really fine ones). I would recommend to any age and women and men. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it, will definitely repurchase
customer_reviews.text: Pleasant, light smell that dissipates quickly. It is light weight and you don't need much.I have been using it for 3 months at this point and LOVE it. My skin looks amazing and healthy
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday, twice a day. Its amazing. Its made my skin pretty dang even from when I started in February to now. I love it, and it feels like pampering my skin each time I use it. Its hydrating for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Mace

customer_reviews.title: Good vslue
customer_reviews.text: Nice product and a good value Did not really like that the smell but otherwise does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Hurricane Sue

customer_reviews.title: You can see the difference.
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand of skin products because of the visible results. Reasonable cost for a superior product.
customer_reviews.author: Shoshanna

customer_reviews.title: My go to daily serum
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have very sensitive skin and it does not break me out. Non greasy, I use morning and night.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Johnsen

customer_reviews.title: Can’t live without.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I see a difference in my skin when I use it and when I don’t. Texture is better with it, and a lot less fine lines. Love this!!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Been using this for a week and do notice some ...
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for a week and do notice some improvement in skin softness and firmness. Too early for any major results. Will update in a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I have no problem with this product. It works well, and I am especially glad that no cruel animal testing is used and that it does not harm the environment.
customer_reviews.author: Diana C

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoying this product, using evening and morning. Leaves my skin supple with no shine or greasy feeling; and I like to think it’s helping those fine lines look a little less obvious!
customer_reviews.author: TRACY

customer_reviews.title: Works great for wrinkles.
customer_reviews.text: Received a sample in my Ipsy bag and noticed a difference after using that tube. No smell, which is great. I have sensitive skin and this did not cause breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: Laney Grubbs

customer_reviews.title: Smells bad.
customer_reviews.text: No idea on effectiveness. Cannot stand to use because of smell. Smells kind of like a hair permanent.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Easley

customer_reviews.title: Its not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: This didnt feel at all moisturizing and I didnt like the texture. I'm not sure I feel a difference in my skin
customer_reviews.author: Aravier

customer_reviews.title: Only need a little for a lot of results!
customer_reviews.text: I had tried a sample of this product from Whole Foods and noticed fine line repair around my eyes within days. I ordered the larger version online to keep up with my morning regime. I use it daily now pre-moisturizer
customer_reviews.author: Donna K.

customer_reviews.title: Great peptide serum at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I like the sheerness of it. A little goes a long way and can be added to your moisturizer or used alone.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda T.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. I like the way it makes my skin feel tighter and reduces some of my fine lines (wrinkles).
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette Kivett

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS STUFF!! DERMA E Advanced Peptides & Collagen Serum, 2oz
customer_reviews.text: My sister received this as a sample, we tried it and we loved it and ordered a full size bottle. It’s really helped my complexion and this is my second order. I have small wrinkles around and under my eyes and they're minimal now!! Love the scent, its light and it doesn't dry greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice serum, one of the most effective serums I ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice serum, one of the most effective serums I have ever used. It has made a positive difference in my skins overall appearance. Much more affordable than most as well.
customer_reviews.author: G. Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: If you like something light and effective this is it. I have been using it sense it came out and i love it along with all the Derma -e products you are getting top quality at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: D Minden

customer_reviews.title: The best!!
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin around my eyes and since I’ve discovered derma-e products that’s all I use on my face. I struggled o find moisturizer that didn’t feel uncomfortable. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jennipher Hennessey

customer_reviews.title: I love this Serum
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about 5 yrs. I never go a day without it. It works well under my facecream for added protection without heavy coverage. I always like to use a Peptide ingredient and Peptide plus works to reduce wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: carol a sparks

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Feels very good and nourishing on your skin.

customer_reviews.title: Best one ever
customer_reviews.text: I Love it Make ur skin somth and glow 😍🥰

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about 5 years. This helped with my smile lines and prevented future ones. This is a great product and it delivers!

customer_reviews.title: Didn't see any difference using this product on  my face.
customer_reviews.text: No significant difference in using this product on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Lesa

customer_reviews.title: I like everything about it
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about it. In the short time I have had it I notice a nice glow to my skin and it feels great!
customer_reviews.author: Marcel L.

customer_reviews.title: More than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Works great, absolutely love it. I have sensitive skin and yet to have irritation from the formula. Love it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kat lorde

customer_reviews.title: Patience is the clue.
customer_reviews.text: I think it's plumping but it is, understandably, a slow go.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It reduces the fine lines atound my lips and around my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: vanessa Vanhyning

customer_reviews.title: Excellent moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This product makes my face feel dewy, radiate when used with the moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: frank close

customer_reviews.title: Best face cream
customer_reviews.text: I love this skin care line., it has changed my life. I really love how this cream absorbs into my skin and leaves a slight youthful dewy sheen before bedtime. It has made my skin so soft and less crinkly.
customer_reviews.author: MsKatalind

customer_reviews.title: dena wrinkle reverse serum
customer_reviews.text: This product works well and really does work. I saw results in 2 weeks of using this product and will be ordering more when I'm out. thanks R.Stevenson
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: I like DORMA E
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the product and will recommend it to my family and friends
customer_reviews.author: annie gear-laws

customer_reviews.title: that the product i use only gets better
customer_reviews.text: i've used my products for years and am happy with them
customer_reviews.author: nan

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I used Hydroxatone before trying this (which was like 3 times the price), and since using this along with the night cream, I've seen very similar results. Doesn't take the wrinkles away completely, but does minimize them some and keeps them from getting worse!
customer_reviews.author: Suzy M.

customer_reviews.title: effective product
customer_reviews.text: Great product - really noticed an effect on my skin!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Derma E Peptides Plus Wrinkle Reverse Serum -- 2 fl oz This is an excellent product. Peptide creams can be very expensive and this is a good value. I love the product.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: Not up to snuff
customer_reviews.text: This stuff made me break out. The packaging makes it sound wonderful, but the product is greasy and feels awful on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: grandmacc

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I've had no illusion that this will miraculously make my wrinkles disappear, But it seems that I am really less wrinkly than my other friends my age. I've been using this for years for maintenance. I use the brand's hyaluronic acid serum alongside this, for hydrating. I love the serum form because it is not sticky. Amazon price is much less than the manufacturer's website price.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Lola

customer_reviews.title: Derma e Peptides plus moisturizes with varied results
customer_reviews.text: I've heard that serums are good but this makes me break out On the other hand it is gentle enough to use around my eyes I really didn't notice any decreased wrinkles maybe just the prevention of new ones Overall even though it moisturizes I felt like it didn't leave my face any better Maybe worse because of the breakouts
customer_reviews.author: Cvd13

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: So sorry I purchased this item. I'm always willing to try nice creams but this one is too heavy. Do not like the feel of it on my face at all!
customer_reviews.author: maureen gannon

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: didn't see any change at all and used for 4 wks
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary L. Ditmer

customer_reviews.title: I use this all the time and if I can ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time and if I can get it cheaper other places than in the store, I will.
customer_reviews.author: Joycee

customer_reviews.title: let me give you 2 opinions ....
customer_reviews.text: I didn't see any difference in my eyelids, it's a good size bottle, smells nice but still, didn't see any difference, do anything for me. and taking adventaje of the space... OXITOXYN 2 is a REALLY BAD UNDEREYE CREAM. just feel a kind of tighter skin but if you smille, ALL THE RINKLES POP OUT, THAT IS THE WORSSEEE CREAM THAT I EVER USED, PLUS IT WAS VERY EXPENSIVE.
customer_reviews.author: bellalison

customer_reviews.title: Amount of Matrixyl & Argireline included
customer_reviews.text: The serum and the moisturizer are good and the price is right. However, I would like to see the amount of argireline and matrixyl increased, especially the latter. Matrixyl builds collagen which is the essential ingredient in forming new skin cells and renewing the skin. The amount in these 2 products is not sufficient to really do any good. It would definitely be worth paying more. Also, when I first bought the moisturizer it came in an envelope that was not padded and the top of the jar was broken. The shipper needs to put everything in padded envelopes and wrapped in bubble wrap or in boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara D. Orloff

customer_reviews.title: if you want a product that works like it's described
customer_reviews.text: Ladies, if you want a product that works like it's described, this is it! I was in the Beauty business for 18 years and have tried many natural, organic ingredient and very expensive products, also have acquired too many products in my "personal beauty supply". I will keep and use Derma E products and eliminate the others.
customer_reviews.author: RazzLDazzL

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS SERUM
customer_reviews.text: This serum is AWESOME! II'd give it 100 stars if I could. DermaE is my go-to skin care line and they did not disappoint with this product. It definitely gives my skin a much needed boost. Within a week of using it friends were noticing my skin looking really good. At first I forgot that I had made any changes to my regimen because I was only suing it in the morning but once I noticed a visible difference I started using it in the morning and night. It has definitely helped with diminishing fine lines and giving me a little umph where I need it.
customer_reviews.author: scarlett66

customer_reviews.title: Love this Advanced Peptides & Collagen Serum from Derma E!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have dry, flaky, sensitive skin, and have been trying various products to help with this issue. I have now purchased 4 different Derma E products and am yet to be disappointed. I have only used this serum twice, but my skin is already softer and smoother. It does have kind of a strong smell, but it fades quickly. These products are made of quality ingredients and are all vegan. It's nice to know I can have nice skin without harming animals or the environment. Thank you Derma E!!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Purl

customer_reviews.title: Seems to help with my light wrinkles.
customer_reviews.text: I turned 30 this year and my forehead wrinkles and wrinkles around my lips (smokers lines) were starting to bother me as they were more noticeable. I have started using this daily for over a month. I really do see a small difference in the appearance of my wrinkles. I put this on everyday after my shower while my face is still damp. I'm not sure if this will help with deep-set wrinkles but for my light ones, it seems to be doing some good. I plan to keep using. Also, it dries quick and doesn't leave my face feeling too oily. Has not caused any acne so far either.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing product, waste
customer_reviews.text: This product has done nothing for my skin. No effect, no improvement. I feel like it just sits on my skin and dries. No absorption. Wasted my money, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine D.

customer_reviews.title: A good daily serum
customer_reviews.text: It's too soon to know what the anticipated effects of this serum will be, since I've only used it a couple of weeks. It feels nourishing, though, and it has a nice scent. I apply this serum first after cleansing and follow with my own skin oil and/or cream for moisture. Alone, it doesn't feel that moisturizing. In general, I have found the Derma E products to be excellent, so I trust this will prove itself as well!
customer_reviews.author: Eve B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Serum!
customer_reviews.text: I used this serum before, got something else, then went back to it. I will stay with this. I noticed that my skin care regiment was more effective when I use this serum. My skin stays softer and well-moisturized. The price is very reasonable, and it is effective.
customer_reviews.author: mld925

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, full and liquidy, refreshes and preps the face
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Tried so many, This one feels plump and thick in its liquid form, not thin and useless. Has so many great peptide ingredients, is a good cover/prep for moisturiser and the day ahead!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline L. Isenogle

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I saw no results at all. It actually felt like it dried my skin out more after I applied it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great Skin Product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. Received from ipsy & just had to order full-size. Smells wonderful & I use it religiously morning & night.
customer_reviews.author: Paula S.

customer_reviews.title: zits - I don't understand the glowing reviews
customer_reviews.text: I have never had breakouts like I had with this serum. They were superficial big whiteheads in areas where I've never had a pimple. Too bad it's too late to return it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Weil

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Little stinging if my face is sensitive. Love the lavendar smell and ingredients
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Another Derma e goodie!
customer_reviews.text: Gentle and hydrating serum that is lightweight and has quality ingredients! Good find.
customer_reviews.author: BrandNewReviews

customer_reviews.title: Over 40 skin care
customer_reviews.text: I love the microdermabrasion scrub by Derma E so I was hoping this product would also help my skin. Unfortunately I’ve been using it for a few months now and I’ve noticed no improvement in my skin. Will not be repurchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: My skin texture has completely changed after using this. I love this product. Everything feels tightened and more bouncy.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: This product works!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Love the feel. Already seeing a difference in my skin and wrinkles.

customer_reviews.title: it works immediately
customer_reviews.text: Both my husband and I noticed an immediate improvement. The wrinkles smoothed.

customer_reviews.text: Love this... 60plus year old skin smoother, brighter and brigtened.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product goes on nice and smooth I believe I'm seeing results!

customer_reviews.text: Derma E products are great, eco-ethical, cruelty and GMO free, they work!

customer_reviews.title: skin  begins to feel soft and looks more radiant right away

customer_reviews.title: Gentle, non-irritating serum
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I also use it along wiht the derma e Hyaluronic Acid Serum. I put it on after I shower or bathe, and it soaks right in. Very gentle on my mature skin.
customer_reviews.author: amazon_fan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Virtually eliminated the red blotchy areas from my face, forehead and neck areas caused by excessive dryness.
customer_reviews.author: David L W

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work!
customer_reviews.text: I use this every night before I go to bed after I let my rosacea treatments sink in and it feels nice and seems to be working.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott M.

customer_reviews.title: Have been using it daily and still unsure if it ...
customer_reviews.text: Have been using it daily and still unsure if it is making a difference but I will finish the bottle and write an updated review afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Heckert

customer_reviews.title: Heaven in a Bottle
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Speedy delivery. Miracle product. What more could you want?!
customer_reviews.author: S. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Serum? Really?
customer_reviews.text: Like the product, though not sure I am seeing results or not. Took off a star because this is not what I think of when I buy a serum. This is more of a lotion consistency. Really not sure I would purchase again, so took off another star. 3 stars about sums it up for me. It is just eh, however the price is right.

customer_reviews.title: just ok
customer_reviews.text: No miracle worker. Smells good but haven't seen much improvement.

customer_reviews.title: I've been using it since I purchase it and haven't seen a difference yet
customer_reviews.text: I Hope to see a difference soon if not I want to return it. It's has great feedback but I don't see it.
customer_reviews.author: Vivi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. Have been using it daily for several years, under my regular moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Mallett

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a peptide product WITHOUT toxic chemicals and not-so-safe preservatives. This is it. I need additional moisturizer for the dry weather, but this product feels great -- and is great.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Not only do I like the ingredients, I love the price and am pretty sure my wrinkles are less noticeable
customer_reviews.author: tfro

customer_reviews.title: I however gave it a 4 star as it does not make my skin break out which is rare and it moisturizes quite nicely. I shall continue
customer_reviews.text: Mmmmmmm.... no miracles for sure! can't say that I've seen any big change in my forehead wrinkles but maybe a tiny bit less visible. I however gave it a 4 star as it does not make my skin break out which is rare and it moisturizes quite nicely. I shall continue using the entire tube.... not sure that I will purchase a new one though.
customer_reviews.author: Clau Claus

customer_reviews.title: works for me
customer_reviews.text: this serum seems to be working on my skin, it tingles when it absorbs. Plus I've noticed that I'm not frowning as much as before.
customer_reviews.author: donaru

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that I'm not applying harmful chemicals to my skin. Purchase other products from Derma-E, and am enjoying the benefits. My skin feels smooth, and I think wrinkles are shrinking.
customer_reviews.author: NYmamie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! I saw results the first day. My skin has never looked so healthy and young. I will be using this product for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste Napodano

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkle reverse serum
customer_reviews.text: This product actually works for the price. I hesitated because of the low price was pleasantly surprised. and quite happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Help for Large Pores
customer_reviews.text: There is no miracle wrinkle cream out there, but I am glad I bought this serum. I have more sagging than actual wrinkles and I'm not sure if there is any effect on that yet. What I have noticed is that my large pores look much smaller! Even my 15 year old daughter noticed. It's not advertised for that, but it is the only thing I changed in my skin care regime so it has to be responsible. I also had a friend comment that my skin was looking good although she did not give any specifics. I have oily skin and it not cause any breakouts or additional oiliness.
customer_reviews.author: Denver mom

customer_reviews.title: It feels amazing on my skin
customer_reviews.text: It feels amazing on my skin. Whether it helps build collagen will take a few months. I have had the product about two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: momsinger

customer_reviews.title: Always loved Derma e
customer_reviews.text: Always loved Derma e...This product does NOT disappoint! It is the best I've used to date. PLEASE keep the price reasonable. I will be a steady customer if you do....!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: DERMA-E 0725 advanced Peptides & Collagen Serum, 2oz, White
product_meta.description: Advanced Peptides and Collagen Face Serum also helps support skin’s need for moisture with Vitamin E, and highly effective antioxidants such as Vitamin C and Green Tea provide comprehensive anti-aging benefits. With ingredients that are thought to support collagen health, this is the best collagen and peptide face serum that is designed to promote healthy, youthful-looking skin that glows.
feature_bullets: ADVANCED COLLAGEN BOOSTING SERUM: Enriched with Collagen Peptides to visibly reduces the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles and dryness.
PYCNOGENOL: Anti-aging antioxidants Pycnogenol, Vitamin C and Green Tea help to improve skin’s resilience, tone and texture.
ANTI-AGING FACE SERUM: This rich formula helps to discourage future damage and promotes a smoother, younger-looking complexion. Hydrates skin for unparalleled suppleness.
PANTHENOL (PROVITAMIN B5): This water-soluble vitamin draws moisture to the skin while conditioning the complexion for a smooth, vibrant-looking texture.
ALL NATURAL: 100% vegan and cruelty free, and does not contain parabens, sulfates, mineral oil, lanolin, gluten or GMOs.
